original_text:
123 boom!
Per chi ama l’avventura, spesso i pirati sono un chiodo fisso. La vita di mare del resto, ha un fascino innegabile. Solcare le onde sul proprio veliero, assaltare i vascelli delle ciurme nemiche e scovare tesori su isole tropicali.
Tutte attività che, proposte all’infinito anche nell’intrattenimento (basti pensare agli innumerevoli film o videogiochi a tema pirati che nel corso degli anni hanno ottenuto un immenso successo), riescono a suscitare in noi meraviglia e stupore anche al solo pensiero.
Proprio per questo non sono mai mancate slot machines a tema pirati, e 4Theplayer si lancia in questo panorama proponendo la propria slot piratesca: 123 Boom! Saranno riusciti a creare qualcosa in grado di superare l’immensa concorrenza?
L’Intensa Battaglia Navale Di 123 Boom!
A differenza di molte altre slot piratesche, 123 Boom! Ci catapulta direttamente nel pieno dell’azione.
Sullo sfondo assistiamo allo scontro a suon di cannoni tra due navi, poste ai lati della griglia. Questa è incorniciata in legno, e i suoi rulli scorrono in orizzontale (anche se è possibile utilizzare un tasto per passare ad una griglia tradizionale, e quindi con i rulli in verticale).
Nonostante la mole di azione che uno sfondo del genere dovrebbe comportare, la spettacolarità della scena viene smorzata dal silenzio. La colonna sonora della slot entra infatti in funzione solamente quando i rulli stanno girando, lasciando quindi tra una giocata e l’altra degli imbarazzanti silenzi.
Ciò nonostante, il comparto sonoro è efficace, almeno quando si fa sentire, e riesce a creare seppur ad intermittenza una buona immersione.
Ottimo lavoro invece sui simboli, che si muovono tra le decorazioni a forma di onda all’interno dei rulli. Tutti sono a tema piratesco: tra quelli più semplici troviamo timoni, dobloni, sciabole incrociate, bandiere nere, pistole, mappe e forzieri pieni di monete. I simboli più importanti sono il pirata e la piratessa, affascinanti e pronti all’avventura.
Il simbolo Wild è una bomba, che quando è affiancata a delle posizioni vincenti esploderà dopo un breve conto alla rovescia. Il simbolo bonus è invece un cannone.
Tra Le Onde Di 123 Boom!
La particolarità principale di 123 Boom! Sta proprio nei suoi rulli orizzontali. Oltre a sposarsi benissimo con l’effettiva orizzontalità della scena sullo sfondo (la battaglia navale vista dall’alto), questa funzione è perfetta per la funzione Wild, che scenicamente si fonda proprio sulla palla di cannone scorrevole che arriva a tutta velocità.
Come già anticipato nella funzione precedente, la vincita esplosiva del simbolo Wild si attiva quando questo si trova accanto a delle posizioni vincenti.
Queste vincite esplosive sono le vere protagoniste della modalità speciale di questa slot machine. Quando sui rulli appaiono tre o più simboli scatter bonus (il cannone), avrà inizio la Bonus Feature. Durante il lasso di tempo in cui questa funzione è attiva, le vincite esplosive porteranno con loro un moltiplicatore, che crescerà di vincita in vincita fino a raggiungere un massimo di 99x.
Slot Simili A 123 Boom!
123 Boom! È una slot machine piuttosto semplice. Il tema piratesco, e in particolar modo l’azione della battaglia navale, è ben accentuato dalla sua orizzontalità, che stavolta, a differenza di altre slot, è inerente al tema. Dato anche il suo buon RTP del 96.4%, vale la pena di provarla, specialmente se siete amanti dei pirati.
Se invece cercate altre slot machines a tema piratesco e la vostra sete di avventura non è ancora passata, vi consigliamo Wild Pirates o Pirate Gold Deluxe, con le quali riuscirete a immergervi nuovamente tra i mari affollati dai pirati.

raw_translation.response:
For those who love adventure, pirates are often a recurring theme. Life at sea has an undeniable allure - sailing the waves on your own ship, raiding the enemy's vessels, and discovering treasure on tropical islands. These activities have been endlessly depicted in entertainment (with numerous pirate-themed films and video games that have achieved immense success over the years), always capable of eliciting wonder and amazement in us even at the mere thought. That's why pirate-themed slot machines have never been in short supply, and 4Theplayer has joined the scene by offering their own pirate slot game: 123 Boom! Have they managed to create something that can surpass the immense competition?

The Intense Naval Battle of 123 Boom!
Unlike many other pirate-themed slots, 123 Boom! immerses us directly into the action. In the background, we witness a battle between two ships, blasting each other with cannons, placed on either side of the grid. The grid is framed in wood, and its reels scroll horizontally (although it is possible to use a button to switch to a traditional grid, with reels in a vertical orientation). Despite the amount of action that a background like this should entail, the spectacle of the scene is dampened by silence. The slot's soundtrack only comes into play when the reels are spinning, leaving embarrassing silence between plays.

Regardless, the sound design is effective, at least when it is heard, and manages to create a good immersion intermittently. The symbols, on the other hand, show excellent workmanship, moving between wave-shaped decorations within the reels. All of them are pirate-themed: among the simple ones are helm wheels, doubloons, crossed swords, black flags, guns, maps, and treasure chests full of coins. The most important symbols are the male and female pirates - both fascinating and ready for adventure. The Wild symbol is a bomb that explodes after a brief countdown when next to winning positions. The bonus symbol is a cannon.

Amidst the Waves of 123 Boom!
The main peculiarity of 123 Boom! lies in its horizontal reels. In addition to merging well with the actual horizontal scene in the background (naval battle seen from above), this feature is perfect for the Wild function, which scenically focuses on the sliding cannonball that arrives at full speed. As already hinted at in the previous section, the explosive win of the Wild symbol is triggered when it is next to winning positions.

These explosive wins are the real stars of this slot machine's special mode. When three or more bonus scatter symbols (the cannon) appear on the reels, the Bonus Feature starts. During the time this function is active, the explosive wins will bring with them a multiplier that grows with each win, reaching a maximum of 99x.

Slot Games Similar to 123 Boom!
123 Boom! is a rather simple slot machine. The pirate theme, and especially the naval battle action, is well emphasized by its horizontality, which this time, unlike other slots, is inherent to the theme. Given its good RTP of 96.4%, it is worth trying, especially if you love pirates.   If you are looking for other pirate-themed slot machines and your thirst for adventure hasn't been quenched yet, we recommend Wild Pirates or Pirate Gold Deluxe, where you can immerse yourself again in the seas crowded with pirates.

That's why pirate-themed slot machines have never been in short supply, and 4Theplayer has joined the scene by offering their own pirate slot game: 123 Boom! Have they managed to create something that can surpass the immense competition?

The Intense Naval Battle of 123 Boom!
Unlike many other pirate-themed slots, 123 Boom! immerses us directly into the action. In the background, we witness a battle between two ships, blasting each other with cannons, placed on either side of the grid. The grid is framed in wood, and its reels scroll horizontally (although it is possible to use a button to switch to a traditional grid, with reels in a vertical orientation). Despite the amount of action that a background like this should entail, the spectacle of the scene is dampened by silence. The slot's soundtrack only comes into play when the reels are spinning, leaving embarrassing silence between plays.

All of them are pirate-themed: among the simple ones are helm wheels, doubloons, crossed swords, black flags, guns, maps, and treasure chests full of coins. The most important symbols are the male and female pirates - both fascinating and ready for adventure. The Wild symbol is a bomb that explodes after a brief countdown when next to winning positions. Amidst the Waves of 123 Boom!
The main peculiarity of 123 Boom! lies in its horizontal reels. In addition to merging well with the actual horizontal scene in the background (naval battle seen from above), this feature is perfect for the Wild function, which scenically focuses on the sliding cannonball that arrives at full speed. As already hinted at in the previous section, the explosive win of the Wild symbol is triggered when it is next to winning positions.

These explosive wins are the real stars of this slot machine's special mode. When three or more bonus scatter symbols (the cannon) appear on the reels, the Bonus Feature starts. During the time this function is active, the explosive wins will bring with them a multiplier that grows with each win, reaching a maximum of 99x.

Slot Games Similar to 123 Boom!

The pirate theme, and especially the naval battle action, is well emphasized by its horizontality, which this time, unlike other slots, is inherent to the theme. These activities have been endlessly depicted in entertainment (with numerous pirate-themed films and video games that have achieved immense success over the years), always capable of eliciting wonder and amazement in us even at the mere thought. That's why pirate-themed slot machines have never been in short supply, and 4Theplayer has joined the scene by offering their own pirate slot game: 123 Boom! Have they managed to create something that can surpass the immense competition?

The Intense Naval Battle of 123 Boom!
Unlike many other pirate-themed slots, 123 Boom! immerses us directly into the action. In the background, we witness a battle between two ships, blasting each other with cannons, placed on either side of the grid. The grid is framed in wood, and its reels scroll horizontally (although it is possible to use a button to switch to a traditional grid, with reels in a vertical orientation). Despite the amount of action that a background like this should entail, the spectacle of the scene is dampened by silence. The slot's soundtrack only comes into play when the reels are spinning, leaving embarrassing silence between plays.

Regardless, the sound design is effective, at least when it is heard, and manages to create a good immersion intermittently. The symbols, on the other hand, show excellent workmanship, moving between wave-shaped decorations within the reels. All of them are pirate-themed: among the simple ones are helm wheels, doubloons, crossed swords, black flags, guns, maps, and treasure chests full of coins. The most important symbols are the male and female pirates - both fascinating and ready for adventure. The Wild symbol is a bomb that explodes after a brief countdown when next to winning positions. The bonus symbol is a cannon.

Amidst the Waves of 123 Boom!
The main peculiarity of 123 Boom! lies in its horizontal reels. In addition to merging well with the actual horizontal scene in the background (naval battle seen from above), this feature is perfect for the Wild function, which scenically focuses on the sliding cannonball that arrives at full speed. As already hinted at in the previous section, the explosive win of the Wild symbol is triggered when it is next to winning positions.

These explosive wins are the real stars of this slot machine's special mode. When three or more bonus scatter symbols (the cannon) appear on the reels, the Bonus Feature starts. During the time this function is active, the explosive wins will bring with them a multiplier that grows with each win, reaching a maximum of 99x.

Slot Games Similar to 123 Boom!
123 Boom! is a rather simple slot machine. The pirate theme, and especially the naval battle action, is well emphasized by its horizontality, which this time, unlike other slots, is inherent to the theme. Given its good RTP of 96.4%, it is worth trying, especially if you love pirates.   If you are looking for other pirate-themed slot machines and your thirst for adventure hasn't been quenched yet, we recommend Wild Pirates or Pirate Gold Deluxe, where you can immerse yourself again in the seas crowded with pirates.
